summary: An armor-set which fits to the "Dwarven Black Weapons  of Fate".
descriptionHtml:
!!!Dragonborn is required!!!

Finally, my second mod, the "Dwarven Black Armor of Fate" is ready.

This armor-set is designed to fit to the "Dwarven Black Weapons of Fate". It has the same style (Black with white ornaments) and also very strong enchantments. A similar quest is also integrated: To start it, loot the dead "Dwemer Researcher" shortly after the entrance of Fahlbtharz (Solstheim) and take his notes. (He also has got some Dwarven Ale and tasty pies!)

The Black Weapons of Fate can be downloaded here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39679/?

This pack contains:

-Dwarven Black Boots of Fate:

Waterwalking if weapon drawn.
Stamina regenerates 50% faster.
You are 50% faster.
Increases your stamina by 500 if not in combat / by 100 if in combat.

-Dwarven Black Armor of Fate:

Increases health by 70.
Health regenerates 50% faster.
Increases carrying capacity by 100.
Increases desease and poison resistance by 100%.
Increases magic resistance by 30%.

-Dwarven Black Gauntlets of Fate:

Tow- and One-Handed weapons do 20 % more damage.
Magicka is increased by 500 if not in Combat / by 100 if in Combat.
Magicka regenerates 50% faster.

-Dwarven Black Helmet of Fate:

Waterbreathing.
Adds the "Breath of Numidium".
Bows do 30% more damage.

-Dwarven Black Shield of Fate:

Destroys incoming spells while blocking.

______________________________________________

Unenchanted versions are forgable if you have the Ebony- and Dwarven-Smithing perks.

Hope you enjoy it!
___________
Updates:
v1.1 (08/11/13):

-Fixed disenchanting
-Minor fixes

v1 (08/11/13):

-Release
author: Planet-X
